thread.title: U.S. stock futures jump 1 pct following Greek reform proposals
thread.title_full: U.S. stock futures jump 1 pct following Greek reform proposals | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: U.S. stock futures jump 1 pct following Greek reform proposals
text:
TOKYO, July 10 U.S. stock futures rallied as much as 1.0 percent in early Asian trade on Friday after Greece offered new measures to boost revenue, including scrapping tax breaks for islands, raising hopes of a cash-for-reform deal.
S&P 500 mini futures rose to as high as 2061.75, up 1.0 percent from late U.S. levels. They last stood at 2058.50, up 0.9 percent.
(Reporting by Hideyuki Sano ; Editing by Shri Navaratnam)
